'''Secret Archive''' is [[Shikanoin Heizou]]'s [[Level 5 Constellation]].

==Trivia==
* The Japanese name of the constellation is likely a reference to a mystery novel by Arisugawa Alice titled {{ja|有栖川有栖の密室大図鑑|rm=Arisugawa Arisu no Misshitsu Daizukan|tl=Arisugawa Alice's Illustrated Guide to the Locked Room.}}
